setting.msg-restart-required: Spreminjanje te možnosti zahteva ponovni zagon, da začne veljati.

editor.name: Urejevalnik
editor.option-spellcheck-description: Vklopi preverjanje črkovanja. Trenutno deluje samo za angleščino (ZDA).
editor.spellcheck-languages-description: Izberite jezike, ki jih bo uporabljal preverjevalnik črkovanja.
editor.spellcheck-languages-mac-description: Nativni preverjevalnik črkovanja bo na macOS samodejno zaznal uporabljeni jezik.
editor.spellcheck-dict-empty: Slovar za preverjanje črkovanja je prazen.
editor.option-show-inline-title-description: Prikaže ime datoteke kot urejljiv naslov v vrstici z vsebino datoteke.
editor.option-readable-line-description: Omeji največjo dolžino vrstice. Na zaslonu prikaže manj vsebine, vendar naredi dolge odstavke bolj berljive.
editor.option-strict-line-break-description: V načinu predogleda ignorira enojne prelome vrstic v skladu s specifikacijami Markdown. Izklopite to možnost, da se enojni prelomi vrstic prikažejo v predogledu.
editor.option-properties-in-document-descriptio: Izberite, kako so lastnosti prikazane v urejevalniku. Izberite »vir«, da bodo lastnosti prikazane kot YAML.
editor.option-auto-pair-markdown-description: Samodejno parjenje simbolov za krepko, ležeče, poudarjeno, prečrtano in kodo.
editor.option-smart-indent-lists-description: Poskrbi za zamik in oznako seznama namesto vas.
editor.option-fold-indent-description: Omogoča zlaganje dela z enakim zamikom, kot so seznami.
editor.option-default-new-tab-view-description: Privzeti pogled, v katerem se odpre nov zavihek Markdown.
editor.option-open-tab-in-foreground-descriptio: Ko odprete povezavo v novem zavihku, se takoj preklopi nanj.
editor.option-default-editing-mode-description: Privzeti način urejanja, s katerim se bo začel nov podokno.
editor.option-indentation-guide-description: Prikaži navpične črte med oznakami za vizualno vodenje.
editor.option-use-tabs-description: Uporabi zavihke za zamik ob pritisku na tipko "Tab". Izklopite to možnost za uporabo presledkov.
editor.option-tab-size-description: Število presledkov, ki ustreza enemu zavihku.
editor.option-rtl-description: Nastavi smer besedila v zapiskih na prikaz od desne proti levi.
editor.option-auto-convert-html-description: Samodejno pretvarjanje HTML v Markdown pri lepljenju in povleci in spusti iz spletnih strani. Uporabite Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+V za lepljenje brez pretvorbe.
editor.option-vim-key-bindings-description: Omogoča uporabo Vim tipk v urejevalniku virov.
editor.option-vim-key-bindings-mobile: Na mobilnih napravah je ta nastavitev na napravi in ​​ni sinhronizirana prek konfiguracijske datoteke.
editor.option-reindex-vault-description: Ponovna izgradnja predpomnilnika lahko traja od nekaj sekund do nekaj minut, odvisno od velikosti vašega sefa.
editor.label-vim-warning: Način Vim je namenjen učinkovitemu urejanju besedila, vendar je lahko precej neintuitiven. Če niste seznanjeni z Vim, se vam lahko zdi, da Obsidian ne deluje več.
editor.label-vim-test: Za preverjanje, ali poznate način Vim, vnesite ukaz za izhod iz Vim brez shranjevanja spodaj:
editor.msg-vim-mode-enabled: Ukaz je pravilen. Način Vim je zdaj omogočen.
editor.msg-vim-mode-not-enabled: Ukaz je napačen. Način Vim ostaja onemogočen za vašo zaščito.
editor.msg-vim-mode-please-enter-command: Prosimo, vnesite ukaz za omogočanje načina Vim

file.name: Datoteke in povezave
file.option-confirm-file-deletion-description: Ali želite, da se prikaže poziv za potrditev brisanja datoteke.
file.option-delete-destination-description: Kaj storiti z datotekami po brisanju.
file.option-always-update-links-description: Ali naj se povezave samodejno posodobijo po preimenovanju datoteke ali naj se prikaže poziv.
file.option-new-note-location-description: Kje shraniti na novo ustvarjene zapiske. Nastavitve vtičnikov bodo preglasile to nastavitev.
file.option-new-file-folder-path-description: Na novo ustvarjeni zapiski se bodo pojavili v tej mapi. Nastavitve vtičnikov bodo preglasile to nastavitev.
file.option-use-wiki-links-description: Samodejno generiraj Wikilinks za [[povezave]] in ![[slike]] namesto Markdown povezav in slik. Onemogočite to možnost za generiranje Markdown povezav.
file.option-show-unsupported-files-descriptio: Prikaži datoteke z vsemi priponami, tudi če jih Obsidian ne more odpreti nativno, da jih lahko povežete in vidite v Raziskovalcu datotek in Hitrem preklapljalcu.
file.option-link-autocompleted-format-descrip: Katere povezave vstaviti pri samodejnem generiranju notranjih povezav.
file.option-new-attachment-location-descripti: Kje bodo shranjene na novo dodane priloge.
file.option-attachment-folder-path-descriptio: Na novo ustvarjene datoteke prilog se bodo pojavile tukaj. To vključuje slike, ustvarjene z vlečenjem in spuščanjem ali lepljenjem, ter zvočne posnetke.
file.option-attachment-subfolder-path-descrip: Če je vaša datoteka v "vault/mapi", in nastavite ime podmape na "priloge", bodo priloge shranjene v "vault/mapi/priloge".
file.option-excluded-files-desc: Izključene datoteke bodo bodisi skrite bodisi manj opazne na različnih mestih, kot so Hiter preklapljalec, predlogi povezav in Grafični pogled.
file.label-no-excluded-filters-applied: Trenutno ni uporabljen noben izključevalni filter. Dodajte enega spodaj.
file.label-excluded-filters-applied: Datoteke, ki ustrezajo naslednjim filtrom, so trenutno izključene:
file.option-uri-callbacks-desc: Omogoči uporabo x-callback-url prek x-success ali x-error pri obdelavi Obsidian URI-jev.

appearance.name: Videz
appearance.option-accent-color-description: Izberite barvo poudarka, ki se uporablja po celotni aplikaciji.
appearance.option-interface-font-description: Nastavite osnovno pisavo za celoten Obsidian.
appearance.option-text-font-description: Nastavite pisavo za urejanje in branje.
appearance.option-monospace-font-description: Nastavite pisavo za mesta, kot so blok kode in frontmatter.
appearance.label-no-custom-font-set: Trenutno ni uporabljena nobena prilagojena pisava. Dodajte eno spodaj.
appearance.label-font-applied: Prva pisava s tega seznama, ki je na voljo v vašem sistemu, bo uporabljena.
appearance.msg-font-not-found: Ta pisava ni zaznana v vašem sistemu.
appearance.msg-font-found: Ta pisava je zaznana v vašem sistemu.
appearance.option-community-themes-description: Predogled in uporaba neverjetnih tem, ki jih je ustvarila skupnost.
appearance.option-font-size-description: Velikost pisave v slikovnih pikah, ki vpliva na urejevalnik in predogled.
appearance.option-font-size-action-description: Prilagodite velikost pisave z uporabo Ctrl + Scroll ali z uporabo geste za povečavo na sledilni ploščici.
appearance.option-manage-themes-description: Upravljajte nameščene teme in brskajte po temah skupnosti.
appearance.option-native-menus-desc: Meniji po celotni aplikaciji bodo ustrezali operacijskemu sistemu. Ne bodo vplivali na vašo temo.
appearance.label-no-css-snippets-found: V mapi z izrezki ni najdenih CSS izrezkov.
appearance.option-frame-description: Določa slog naslovne vrstice oken Obsidiana. Zahteva popoln ponovni zagon, da začne veljati.
appearance.option-configure-ribbon-desc: Konfigurirajte, katere ukaze želite prikazati v meniju z bližnjicami v navigacijski vrstici.
appearance.option-mobile-quick-ribbon-item: Element hitrega dostopa v meniju z bližnjicami
appearance.option-mobile-quick-ribbon-item-desc: Dotik na element v meniju z bližnjicami v navigacijskem meniju bo aktiviral ta element. Dotik in držanje bo še vedno prikazalo meni.
appearance.option-show-ribbon-desc: Prikaži navpično orodno vrstico na strani okna.
appearance.label-modal-configuration-desc: Izberite, katere elemente želite aktivirati v meniju z bližnjicami. Povlecite in spustite za spremembo vrstnega reda.
appearance.option-show-view-header-desc: Prikaži glavo na vrhu vsakega zavihka.

hotkeys.name: Bližnjice
hotkeys.tooltip-hotkey-single-conflict: Ta bližnjica je v konfliktu z "{{command}}"
hotkeys.tooltip-hotkey-multiple-conflicts: Ta bližnjica je v konfliktu z {{count}} drugimi ukazi

about.name: Splošno
about.label-manual-update-required: Za podporo najnovejših funkcij in prejemanje najnovejših varnostnih popravkov je potrebna večja posodobitev namestitvenega programa Obsidian. Ročno morate prenesti in ponovno namestiti Obsidian.
about.label-new-version-ready: Nova različica je pripravljena za namestitev.
about.option-auto-update-description: Izklopite to možnost, da preprečite aplikaciji preverjanje posodobitev.
about.option-check-slow-startup: Obvesti, če zagon traja dlje kot običajno
about.option-check-slow-startup-description: Diagnosticirajte težave z vašo aplikacijo in preverite, kaj povzroča počasno nalaganje aplikacije.
about.option-insider-build-description: Samodejno posodabljanje na insider gradnje za preizkušanje novih funkcij. Upoštevajte, da so te gradnje na robu in morda manj stabilne.
about.option-hw-acceleration-description: Vklopi strojno pospeševanje, ki uporablja vaš GPU za bolj gladko delovanje Obsidiana.
about.option-hw-acceleration-warning: Če to izklopite, bo delovanje aplikacije močno poslabšano.
about.option-config-location-description: Uporabite drugo mapo s konfiguracijo kot privzeto. Mapa mora začeti z piko.
about.option-config-location-warning: Lokacija konfiguracije mora biti veljavno ime mape, ki se začne s piko.
about.label-commercial-license-info: Registrirano na "{{company}}" za {{seats}} uporabnikov. Veljavno do {{expiry}}.
about.option-catalyst-desc: Trenutno imate {{tier}} Catalyst licenco. Hvala za vašo podporo!
about.option-catalyst-desc-no-license: Trenutno nimate Catalyst licence. Catalyst licenca je enkratna donacija za podporo razvoju Obsidiana.
about.label-add-own-language: Naučite se, kako dodati nov jezik v Obsidian.

account.name: Račun
account.option-your-account-desc-no-login: Trenutno niste prijavljeni. Račun je potreben samo za Obsidian Sync, Obsidian Publish in Catalyst insider gradnje.
account.option-commercial-license-desc: Če uporabljate Obsidian za komercialne namene, boste morda potrebovali komercialno licenco.
account.message-login-failed: Prijava ni uspela, prosimo, preverite svojo e-pošto in geslo.
account.mfa-verification-failed: 2FA koda je napačna, prosimo, preverite svojo aplikacijo za avtentikacijo.

core-plugin.option-search-plugin-description: Filtriraj vtičnike po imenu ali opisu.

third-party-plugin.name: Vtičnik tretje osebe
third-party-plugin.option-restricted-mode-description: Omejeni način je izklopljen. Vklopite za onemogočanje vtičnikov skupnosti.
third-party-plugin.option-browse-community-plugins-descript: Brskajte in namestite vtičnike tretjih oseb, ki jih je ustvarila naša neverjetna skupnost.
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-description-1: Vtičniki skupnosti, tako kot katera koli druga programska oprema, ki jo namestite, lahko potencialno povzročijo težave z integriteto podatkov in varnostjo.
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-description-2: Varnost vtičnikov nam je pomembna. Tukaj je, kaj počnemo:
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-description-3: Kljub našim prizadevanjem obstaja majhna možnost, da se vtičnik skupnosti obnaša nepravilno.
third-party-plugin.label-code-review-desc: Vtičniki opravijo začetni pregled kode s strani naše ekipe, preden se pojavijo v trgovini.
third-party-plugin.label-open-source-desc: Večina vtičnikov je odprtokodnih na GitHubu, tako da lahko sami pregledate kodo.
third-party-plugin.label-peer-audit-desc: Imamo veliko skupnost razvijalcev, ki pazijo drug na drugega.
third-party-plugin.label-report-mechanism-desc: Sledimo in odstranjujemo napačne vtičnike po prijavi uporabnikov.
third-party-plugin.label-exit-restricted-mode-disable-confi: Ali želite izstopiti iz omejenega načina, da omogočite vtičnike skupnosti? Močno priporočamo, da pred tem naredite varnostne kopije svojih podatkov.
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author-description-1: To sef odpirate prvič in vsebuje nekaj vtičnikov.
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author-description-2: Če ste ta sef pridobili od nekoga drugega, upoštevajte, da vtičniki neznanega izvora lahko predstavljajo varnostna tveganja.
third-party-plugin.label-trust-author-description-3: Če avtorju tega sefa popolnoma ne zaupate, priporočamo, da ostanete v omejenem načinu, tako da vtičniki v tem sefu ne delujejo.
third-party-plugin.label-no-recent-files-found: Ni najdenih nedavnih datotek. Vnesite za iskanje...
third-party-plugin.label-unsupported: Ta vtičnik ne podpira vaše naprave.
third-party-plugin.label-no-readme: Ta vtičnik ni zagotovil datoteke README.
third-party-plugin.label-uninstall-plugin-confirmation: Ali ste prepričani, da želite odstraniti ta vtičnik? To bo izbrisalo mapo vtičnika.
third-party-plugin.option-search-installed-plugin-descripti: Filtriraj nameščene vtičnike po imenu ali opisu.
third-party-plugin.label-donate-modal-text1: Razvijalci vtičnikov so prostovoljci iz skupnosti, ki iz strasti ustvarjajo neverjetne stvari. Če se vam zdi ta vtičnik uporaben, razmislite o financiranju njegovega razvoja.
third-party-plugin.label-donate-modal-text2: 100% vašega prispevka bo šlo razvijalcu vtičnika; Obsidian ne vzame deleža. Platforma za financiranje, ki jo izberejo, lahko zaračuna provizijo.

mobile-toolbar.name: Mobilna orodna vrstica
mobile-toolbar.option-configure-quick-action: Konfiguriraj hitro dejanje na mobilni napravi
mobile-toolbar.option-configure-quick-action-descriptio: Konfigurirajte, kateri ukaz se sproži ob potegu navzdol z vrha. Trenutni ukaz je nastavljen na "{{command}}".
mobile-toolbar.option-add-command-description: Izberite kateri koli globalni ukaz za dodajanje v orodno vrstico.

print-modal.title: Izvoz v PDF
print-modal.caption: Izvozi "{{filename}}" v PDF z nastavitvijo spodaj.

interface.empty-sidebar: Stranska vrstica je prazna, poskusite povleči del tukaj.
interface.msg-plugin-error: Vtičnik “{{plugin}}” je naletel na napako pri nalaganju
interface.msg-file-changed: "{{file}}" je bil zunanji spremenjen, avtomatsko združujem spremembe.
interface.msg-switched-to-read: Privzeti način pogleda preklopljen na branje.
interface.msg-switched-to-edit: Privzeti način pogleda preklopljen na urejanje.
interface.msg-upgrade-installer: Za uporabo te funkcije, prosimo, ponovno namestite z najnovejšo namestitveno različico, ki je na voljo na naši spletni strani.
interface.msg-desktop-only-feature: Ta funkcija je na voljo samo v namizni aplikaciji.
interface.msg-indexing:
Obsidian indexira vaš sef...
To se mora zgoditi le enkrat.
Nekatere funkcionalnosti morda ne bodo na voljo, dokler to ne bo dokončano.
interface.msg-sandbox-vault:
To je sandbox sef.
Spremembe, ki jih naredite v tem sefu, bodo izgubljene.
interface.msg-tab-busy: Ta zavihek je trenutno zaseden, prosim poskusite kasneje.

empty-state.unknown-pane-desc: Vtičnik, ki je ustvaril to okno ({{type}}), je prenehal delovati

menu.edit-view: Uredi (Ctrl/Cmd+Klik za urejanje v novem podoknu)

tooltip.not-created-yet: Še ni ustvarjeno, izberite za ustvarjanje

start-screen.option-open-folder-as-vault-description: Izberite obstoječo mapo z Markdown datotekami.
start-screen.option-create-vault-description: Ustvarite nov Obsidian sef v mapi.
start-screen.option-connect-obsidian-sync-description: Nastavite sinhroniziran sef z obstoječim oddaljenim sefom.
start-screen.option-new-vault-name-description: Izberite ime za vaš čudovit sef.
start-screen.option-new-vault-location-description: Izberite mesto za vaš novi sef.
start-screen.label-new-vault-location-preview: Vaš novi sef bo postavljen v:
start-screen.msg-error-rename-exists: Sef s tem imenom že obstaja.
start-screen.msg-error-nested: Ne morem premakniti sefa v podmapo samega sebe.
start-screen.msg-error-rename-open: Ne morem preimenovati trenutno odprtega sefa.
start-screen.msg-error-move-exists: Na ciljni lokaciji že obstaja sef.
start-screen.msg-error-move-open: Ne morem premakniti trenutno odprtega sefa.
start-screen.msg-empty-vault-name: Ime sefa ne sme biti prazno.
start-screen.msg-trailing-dot-vault-name: Ime sefa se ne sme končati s piko.
start-screen.msg-failed-to-create-vault-at-location: Sefa ni bilo mogoče ustvariti na dani lokaciji. Prosimo, preverite lokacijo in dovoljenja.
start-screen.msg-error-remove-current-open-vault: Ne morem odstraniti trenutno odprtega sefa.
start-screen.option-connect-vault-desc: Ustvarite sinhroniziran sef na tej napravi.
start-screen.tooltip-own-vault: To je oddaljeni sef, ki ga imate v lasti.
start-screen.tooltip-shared-vault: To je oddaljeni sef, ki je deljen z vami.

starter-content.welcome-file-content:
This is your new *vault*.

Make a note of something, [[create a link]], or try [the Importer](https://help.obsidian.md/Plugins/Importer)!

When you're ready, delete this note and make the vault your own.

start-up.obsidian-load-error: Prišlo je do napake pri nalaganju Obsidiana.
start-up.button-reload-app-in-safe-mode: Ponovno naloži aplikacijo v varnem načinu
start-up.msg-plugin-hang: Vtičnik “{{plugin}}” traja dolgo časa za nalaganje.

mobile.msg-back-again-to-exit: Pritisnite nazaj še enkrat za izhod.

help-screen.label-official-help-site-desc: Preberite uradno dokumentacijo za pomoč Obsidian, ki je na voljo v več jezikih.
help-screen.label-discord-chat-desc: Discord je najboljše mesto za klepet z drugimi izkušenimi uporabniki Obsidiana z vsega sveta.
help-screen.label-forum-desc: Pomagajte si med seboj, objavljajte zahteve za funkcije, poročajte o napakah in se poglobljeno pogovarjajte o upravljanju znanja.
help-screen.label-sandbox-vault-desc: Preizkusite in eksperimentirajte z različnimi funkcijami. Upoštevajte, da vaše spremembe ne bodo shranjene.

commands.open-cursor-link-in-new-tab: Odpri povezavo pod kazalcem v novem zavihku
commands.open-cursor-link-to-the-right: Odpri povezavo pod kazalcem na desni
commands.open-cursor-link-in-new-window: Odpri povezavo pod kazalcem v novem oknu
commands.search-replace-current-file: Išči in zamenjaj v trenutni datoteki
commands.toggle-default-new-tab-mode: Preklopi privzeti način za nove zavihke
commands.toggle-fold-properties: Preklopi zlaganje lastnosti v trenutni datoteki
commands.move-to-new-window: Premakni trenutno podokno v novo okno
commands.open-in-new-window: Odpri trenutno podokno v novem oknu

dialogue.label-confirm-update-link-to-file: Ali želite posodobiti notranje povezave, ki kažejo na to datoteko?
dialogue.label-confirm-deletion: Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati "{{filename}}"?
dialogue.label-move-to-vault-trash: Premaknjen bo v Obsidian koš, ki se nahaja v skriti mapi ".trash" v vašem sefu.
dialogue.label-delete-folder-warning: Če nadaljujete, bodo vse datoteke v tej mapi izbrisane.
dialogue.label-existing-backlink: Trenutno obstaja {{links}} povezav, ki kažejo na to opombo.
dialogue.label-existing-backlink_plural: Trenutno obstaja {{links}} povezav, ki kažejo na to opombo.

file-explorer.name: Raziskovalec datotek
file-explorer.desc: Prikaži vse datoteke v vašem sefu.
file-explorer.action-create-note-in-current-tab: Ustvari nov zapisek v trenutnem zavihku
file-explorer.action-reveal-active-file: Razkrij aktivno datoteko v raziskovalcu datotek
file-explorer.label-sort-a-to-z: Razvrsti po imenu datoteke (A do Ž)
file-explorer.label-sort-z-to-a: Razvrsti po imenu datoteke (Ž do A)
file-explorer.label-sort-new-to-old: Razvrsti po času urejanja (novo do staro)
file-explorer.label-sort-old-to-new: Razvrsti po času urejanja (staro do novo)
file-explorer.msg-invalid-characters: Ime datoteke ne sme vsebovati naslednjih znakov:
file-explorer.msg-unsafe-characters: Povezave ne bodo delovale z imeni datotek, ki vsebujejo katerega od teh znakov:
file-explorer.msg-file-already-exists: Datoteka z istim imenom že obstaja
file-explorer.msg-empty-file-name: Ime datoteke ne sme biti prazno.
file-explorer.msg-bad-dotfile: Ime datoteke se ne sme začeti s piko.

search.name: Iskanje
search.desc: Išči ključno besedo v vseh zapiskih.
search.option-show-path-description: Prikaži celotno pot datoteke namesto samo imena datoteke.
search.option-link-style-description: Opcijsko pretvori vsak rezultat datoteke v povezavo.
search.option-list-prefix-description: Opcijsko dodaj predpono seznama vsakemu rezultatu datoteke.
search.label-line-option-description: išči ključne besede v isti vrstici
search.label-section-option-description: išči ključne besede pod istim naslovom

quick-switcher.name: Hiter preklop
quick-switcher.desc: Skočite na katero koli datoteko, ne da bi zapustili tipkovnico. Ctrl/Cmd+O za aktivacijo.
quick-switcher.label-no-note-create-new: Ni najdenih zapiskov. Vnesite za ustvarjanje novega.
quick-switcher.prompt-type-file-name: Vnesite ime datoteke za preklop ali ustvarjanje...
quick-switcher.tooltip-not-created-yet: Še ni ustvarjeno, izberite za ustvarjanje
quick-switcher.option-show-existing-only-description: Ali naj se prikažejo povezave do datotek, ki še niso ustvarjene.
quick-switcher.option-show-attachments-desc: Prikaži datoteke prilog, kot so slike, videoposnetki in PDF-ji.
quick-switcher.option-show-all-file-types-desc: Prikaži vse datoteke, vključno s tistimi, ki jih Obsidian ne more odpreti. Datoteka se bo odprla z privzeto aplikacijo za to vrsto datoteke.

graph-view.name: Grafični pogled
graph-view.desc: Oglejte si grafični pregled, kateri zapiski se povezujejo med seboj.
graph-view.option-depth-description: Prikaži vozlišča to število povezav stran
graph-view.option-show-tags-description: Oznake so povezane z datotekami, ki jih vsebujejo
graph-view.option-show-existing-files-only-descript: Ko je označeno, povezave do neobstoječih datotek niso prikazane
graph-view.option-show-orphans-description: Prikaži datoteke, ki niso povezane z nobeno drugo datoteko
graph-view.tooltip-click-to-change-drag-to-reorder:
Kliknite za spremembo barve
Povlecite za spremembo vrstnega reda skupin

backlinks.name: Povratne povezave
backlinks.desc: Prikaži število povratnih povezav v vrstici stanja.
backlinks.action-open-for-current: Odpri povratne povezave za trenutno datoteko
backlinks.option-backlink-in-document-desc: Privzeto prikaži povratne povezave v dokumentu pri odpiranju novih podoken.

outgoing-links.name: Odhodne povezave
outgoing-links.desc: Prikaži odhodne povezave in zaznaj nepovezane omembe drugih zapiskov v trenutnem zapisku.
outgoing-links.action-open-for-current: Odpri odhodne povezave za trenutno datoteko

tag-pane.name: Podokno oznak
tag-pane.desc: Prikaže vse vaše oznake skupaj s številom pojavitev.

properties.name: Pogled lastnosti
properties.desc: Prikaži metapodatke za vaše datoteke v stranski vrstici.
properties.msg-merge-properties-warning-desc: V primeru konfliktov bodo vrednosti združene ali pa bo uporabljena vrednost iz “{{oldKey}}”.

page-preview.name: Predogled strani
page-preview.desc: Predogled zapiska ob premiku miške nad notranjo povezavo. Ctrl/Cmd + premik miške v načinu urejevalnika.
page-preview.label-empty-note: "{{linktext}}" še ni ustvarjeno. Kliknite za ustvarjanje.
page-preview.label-missing-footote: Sprotna opomba {{id}} ni najdena. Kliknite za ustvarjanje.
page-preview.label-source-search: Iskanje, Povratne povezave in Odhodne povezave
page-preview.label-require-mod: Zahtevaj {{key}} za sprožitev predogleda strani ob premiku miške

bookmarks.name: Bookmarks
bookmarks.desc: Bookmark frequently used files and searches.

custom-css.name: Custom CSS
custom-css.desc: Reads "obsidian.css" in the vault and applies it.
custom-css.label-no-readme: This theme did not provide a README file.
custom-css.msg-load-error: Could not load community themes, please check your network.
custom-css.msg-now-using-theme: You're now using {{title}} as your CSS theme.

command-palette.name: Ukazna paleta
command-palette.desc: Vnesite ukaz, da ga izvedete. Ni potrebe po uporabi uporabniškega vmesnika ali pomnjenju bližnjic.
command-palette.option-add-new-pin-description: Pripeti ukazi se bodo pojavili na vrhu vseh ukazov, ko ni prisotno iskalno poizvedbo.

markdown-format-importer.name: Markdown format importer
markdown-format-importer.desc: Convert Markdown from other apps to Obsidian format.
markdown-format-importer.zettelkasten-link-fixer-description: Fixes "[[UID]]" links to full "[[UID File Name]]".
markdown-format-importer.zettelkasten-link-beautifier-description: Fixes "[[UID]]" links and also beautify them "[[UID File Name|File Name]]".
markdown-format-importer.msg-all-files-warning: Warning: the importer will convert all the files in your vault, not just the current file.
markdown-format-importer.msg-override-files-warning: Your files will be overwritten. Back up all your files before attempting conversion.

daily-notes.name: Dnevni zapiski
daily-notes.desc: Odpri današnji dnevni zapisek ali ga ustvari, če ni prisoten.
daily-notes.msg-fail-format: Ustvarjanje dnevnega zapiska ni uspelo. "{{format}}" ni veljaven format.
daily-notes.msg-fail-folder: Ustvarjanje dnevnega zapiska ni uspelo. Mapa "{{folderOption}}" ni najdena.
daily-notes.msg-fail-template-file: Ustvarjanje dnevnega zapiska ni uspelo. Predloga "{{template}}" ni najdena.
daily-notes.msg-no-previous: Ni prejšnjega dnevnega zapiska pred tem.
daily-notes.msg-no-next: Ni naslednjega dnevnega zapiska po tem.
daily-notes.option-new-file-location-description: Pot do mape za ustvarjanje novega dnevnega zapiska.
daily-notes.option-template-description: Pot do datoteke, ki se uporablja kot predloga.
daily-notes.option-open-on-start-description: Samodejno odpri dnevni zapisek ob vsakem odpiranju tega sefa.

unique-note-creator.name: Unique note creator
unique-note-creator.desc: Create notes with unique timestamp prefixes, for workflows like zettelkasten or slip box.
unique-note-creator.option-new-file-location-description: The folder path to create the new unique note.
unique-note-creator.msg-folder-not-found: Failed to create unique note. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
unique-note-creator.option-template-file-description: The file path to use as template.
unique-note-creator.msg-template-file-not-found: Failed to create unique note. Template file "{{template}}" not found.
unique-note-creator.msg-failed-to-generate: Failed to generate a unique note with the format "{{format}}

random-note.name: Random note
random-note.desc: Opens a random note. Useful for reviewing and discovering.

outline.name: Oris
outline.desc: Prikaže oris trenutne datoteke ali povezanega podokna.

word-count.name: Število besed
word-count.desc: Prikaži število besed v vrstici stanja.

slides.name: Slides
slides.desc: Present from Markdown. Use "---" to separate slides.

audio-recorder.name: Audio recorder
audio-recorder.desc: Record audio and save as attachment.
audio-recorder.msg-access-denied: Microphone access was denied, please enable it from the preference pane.
audio-recorder.msg-pending-grant: Please grant microphone permission to start recording.

open-with-default-app.name: Odpri v privzeti aplikaciji
open-with-default-app.desc: Dodaj gumb za odpiranje trenutne datoteke v privzeti aplikaciji.

templates.name: Predloge
templates.desc: Vstavi vsebino predloge iz mape s predlogami.
templates.option-template-folder-location-descript: Datoteke v tej mapi bodo na voljo kot predloge.
templates.option-template-date-format-description: {{date}} v datoteki predloge bo zamenjan s to vrednostjo.
templates.option-template-date-format-description2: Lahko uporabite tudi {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}} za enkratno preglasitev formata.
templates.option-template-time-format-description: {{time}} v datoteki predloge bo zamenjan s to vrednostjo.
templates.option-template-time-format-description2: Lahko uporabite tudi {{time:HH:mm}} za enkratno preglasitev formata.
templates.msg-fail-invalid-folder: Seznam predlog ni uspel. Mapa s predlogami je neveljavna.
templates.msg-fail-folder-not-found: Seznam predlog ni uspel. Mapa "{{folderOption}}" ni najdena.
templates.msg-fail-invalid-template-properties: Vstavljanje predloge ni uspelo, lastnosti v datoteki predloge ni bilo mogoče prebrati.
templates.msg-no-folder-set: Seznam predlog ni uspel. Mapa s predlogami ni nastavljena.

translucency.name: Prosojno okno
translucency.desc: Vklopi učinek prosojnosti za izboljšanje občutka globine. Najbolje deluje v temnem načinu. Ni podprto na Linuxu.

slash-command.name: Ukazi s poševnico
slash-command.desc: Omogoči možnost sprožitve ukazov s poševnico v urejevalniku z vnosom poševnice.

editor-status.name: Stanje urejevalnika
editor-status.desc: Doda element v vrstico stanja za prikaz in spremembo trenutnega načina urejevalnika.

publish.name: Publish
publish.desc: Publish your notes through Obsidian Publish.
publish.label-no-internet-access: You need access to the internet to publish changes.
publish.label-publish-service-description: Obsidian Publish is an add-on paid service that lets you publish your notes online directly from Obsidian.
publish.label-please-login: To start publishing, please log in or create a new Obsidian account.
publish.label-no-publish-subscription: You do not have an Obsidian Publish subscription yet.
publish.label-delete-site-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this site?
publish.label-delete-site-details: This will immediately and permanently delete your site.
publish.option-site-id-description: Your site will be at https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id}. You can change this later. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes are allowed.
publish.msg-invalid-site-id: Site ID can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes.
publish.msg-site-id-in-use: This site ID is in use, please try another one.
publish.msg-create-site-issue: That was an issue when creating your site.
publish.option-site-name-description: Name of your published site. It will show up in the page title of your site.
publish.option-home-page-file-description: The first page the user sees when landing on your published site
publish.option-logo-description: Pick an image file as your site logo.
publish.option-logo-placeholder: Any uploaded image in your vault...
publish.option-customize-navigation-desc: Override the order of navigation items and hide pages or folders from showing.
publish.option-hide-items-in-navigation: Hide pages or folders from navigation
publish.option-hide-items-in-navigation-desc: Right click and select "Hide" to prevent specific pages from appearing in the site navigation. The pages will still be accessible via links or accessing the URL directly.
publish.label-navigation-modal-desc: Drag and drop to customize the order in which navigation items appear on your Publish site.
publish.option-theme-description: Choose default color scheme for your site.
publish.option-show-theme-toggle-description: Let the visitor toggle between light and dark theme on their own.
publish.option-show-navigation-description: Display a list of all published pages on the left side of your published site.
publish.option-show-search-description: Display a search bar at top of the navigation that lets the visitors search pages and headings on your site.
publish.option-show-graph-description: Display a small local graph on each page.
publish.option-show-outline-description: Display the outline of headings on each page.
publish.option-show-backlinks-description: Show backlink section at the end of each page.
publish.option-sliding-window-mode-description: Open pages in new panes to the right. Allows scrolling through panes horizontally.
publish.option-hover-preview-file-description: Display page preview when hovering links.
publish.option-hide-title-description: Hide the page title heading. Useful when you have your own headings at the beginning of each page.
publish.option-readable-line-length-description: Limit maximum line length. Fits less content on the screen, but makes long paragraphs more readable.
publish.option-site-password-description: Restrict access to your site with passwords.
publish.option-google-analytics-description: Configure Google Analytics for your site. Only available for visitors from your custom domain URL. Please check with your local laws and regulations first.
publish.tooltip-add-linked: Add all files that are linked by currently selected items
publish.msg-no-permission-to-publish-to-site: You do not have permission to publish to the current site.
publish.msg-select-at-least-one-file: Please select at least one file.
publish.label-clear-cache: It takes up to a few minutes for the changes to show up on your site. If you do not see your latest changes, try clearing the cache in your browser.
publish.label-visit-site: You can visit your site here:
publish.msg-something-went-wrong: Something went wrong. Please check the developer console for details.
publish.label-no-password: Your site currently does not have any passwords. Anyone can visit it.
publish.label-have-password: Your site is password protected. If you have multiple passwords, visitors can access your site by entering any of them.
publish.option-password-desc: A hash of your password will be stored securely. Once the password is set, it cannot be revealed in plaintext.
publish.option-nickname-desc: Set a nickname to remind yourself what or who the password is for.
publish.option-custom-domain-desc: Use your own domain rather than the https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id} URL.
publish.option-noindex-desc: Prevent search engines from indexing your site.
publish.option-custom-url-desc: The URL that your site will be located at.
publish.option-custom-url-redirect-desc: Redirect visitors on publish.obsidian.md/id to your custom domain.
publish.label-custom-domain-instructions: Please refer to our {{link}} on our help site for more information.
publish.label-sharing-with-users: This site is currently shared with the following people.
publish.label-not-sharing: This site is not currently shared with anyone.
publish.error-email-must-be-valid: Please enter a valid email to invite someone.
publish.msg-enable-publish-plugin: Please enable the Publish core plugin in Settings -> Core plugins to view sites.
publish.label-leave-site-confirmation-details: This will remove this site from the list of sites shared with you. This action cannot be reverted.
publish.label-leave-site-confirmation-details-2: Please contact the owner of the site if you wish to collaborate on this site again.
publish.label-confirm-override-1: Are you sure you want to override the local version?
publish.label-confirm-override-2: The live version will be used and your local version will be discarded. Please make backups if necessary.
publish.message-successfully-used-live-version: Successfully used live version to override your local version.
publish.option-included-folders-desc: Files under these folders will automatically be selected when you review changes to publish.
publish.option-excluded-folders-desc: Files under these folders won't show up when you review changes to publish. This setting takes priority over included folders above.
publish.label-add-included-folder-desc: You can include both existing folders and folders that have not been created yet.

workspaces.name: Workspaces
workspaces.msg-enter-name: Please enter a name for the new layout.

sync.name: Sync
sync.desc: Synchronize your files through Obsidian Sync.
sync.msg-already-latest-version: This version is already the latest version.
sync.label-no-history: No sync history for this file.
sync.label-click-to-see-history: Click on a deleted file to see its history.
sync.label-remote-vault-explanation: Remote vaults securely synchronize your vault between devices.
sync.option-vault-name-desc: Helps you remember what this vault is for.
sync.option-vault-region-desc: Select the server region closest to you to store the remote vault. This cannot be changed in the future.
sync.option-encryption-desc: End-to-end encryption offers the strongest security but requires you to safely store your encryption password. Standard encryption uses a key managed by Obsidian to protect your data in transit and on our servers.
sync.option-encryption-warning: This option cannot be changed later.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc: This password cannot be changed later.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc-warning: If you forget this password, any remote data will remain unusable forever.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc-2: This does not affect your local data.
sync.label-encryption-password-explanation: The remote vault “{{name}}” is currently encrypted. Enter your password to unlock.
sync.label-rename-remote-vault-desc: Enter a new name for this remote vault.
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-questi: Are you sure you want to delete this remote vault?
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-result: All data on our server, including version history, will be deleted. Your local files will stay intact.
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-warnin: This action is permanent and irreversible.
sync.msg-disconnect-from-deleted-vault: Obsidian Sync: The connected remote vault no longer exists.
sync.label-not-remote-vaults: You don't have any remote vaults.
sync.label-no-subscription: You don't have an active Obsidian Sync subscription.
sync.label-third-party-sync-warning-desc: Warning: Your vault seems to be using {{service}} as a third party sync service. If you use Obsidian Sync with this vault, you may run into conflicts, file corruption, or data loss.
sync.label-icloud-drive-warning: If you are using iCloud Drive, your Documents and Desktop folders might be synced by iCloud. This could cause conflicts with Obsidian Sync.
sync.option-remote-vault-desc-connected: Currently connected to the "{{name}}" remote vault.
sync.option-remote-vault-desc-not-connected: Currently not connected to any remote vault.
sync.option-device-name-desc: This name will be displayed in the sync log. Leave empty to use the default name.
sync.option-sync-log-desc: View recent sync activities for debugging.
sync.option-vault-size-unknown: Unable to retrieve your vault size.
sync.msg-largest-files-desc: These are the remote files that are taking the most space. After deleting attachments, use the purge button to free up remote vault space.
sync.tooltip-purge-remote: Permanently purge deleted attachments from remote vault to save space.
sync.option-prevent-sleep-desc: Prevents the device from going to sleep when there are still files to be synced.
sync.option-excluded-folder-desc: Prevent certain folders from being synced.
sync.option-sync-image-desc: Sync image files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-sync-audio-desc: Sync audio files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-sync-video-desc: Sync video files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-view-config-files-desc: View and restore version history of setting files.
sync.option-sync-app-desc: Enable to sync editor settings, files & links settings, custom hotkeys, etc.
sync.option-sync-appearance-desc: Sync appearance settings like dark mode, active theme, and enabled snippets.
sync.option-sync-appearance-data-desc: Sync downloaded themes and snippets. Whether they are enabled depends on the previous setting.
sync.option-sync-core-plugin-desc: Sync which core plugins are enabled.
sync.option-sync-community-plugin-desc: Sync which community plugins are enabled.
sync.option-sync-community-plugin-data-desc: Sync installed community plugins (.js, .css, and manifest.json files) and their settings.
sync.label-sync-introduction: Obsidian Sync is Obsidian's add-on sync service with end-to-end encryption and version history.
sync.label-account-required: To start syncing, please log in or create a new Obsidian account.
sync.label-number-of-folders-excluded: {{folders}} are currently excluded from being synced.
sync.label-add-excluded-folder-desc: You can exclude both existing folders and folders that have not been created yet.
sync.msg-vault-has-notes: Your local vault already contains some notes.
sync.msg-vault-merge-warning: If you connect to the remote vault "{{name}}", notes in your local vault will be merged with notes from your remote vault. In case of conflicts, the most recent version of the note will be preserved.
sync.tooltip-update-setting-on-all-devices: Please update this option and restart app on all the devices where you want it to take effect.
sync.label-sharing-with-users: This remote vault is currently shared with the following people.
sync.label-not-sharing: This remote vault is not currently shared with anyone.
sync.label-leave-vault-confirmation-details: This will remove this vault from the list of vaults shared with you. This action cannot be reverted.
sync.label-leave-vault-confirmation-details-2: Please contact the owner of the vault if you wish to collaborate on this vault again.
sync.label-require-subscription-to-connect: You need an Obsidian Sync subscription to connect to this vault.
sync.option-contact-support-desc: If you run into any issues with Obsidian Sync, please contact us so we can help you out! You can reach us at support@obsidian.md.
sync.label-sync-disconnected: Sync is not connected to a remote vault.
sync.msg-remote-vault-limit-hit: Obsidian Sync lets you create up to 5 remote vaults. In order to create a new remote vault, please remove an existing one.
sync.label-upgrade-vault-encryption-desc: There is a new encryption version available for remote vaults.
sync.msg-recreate-remote-vault: This will delete your remote vault and recreate it with the latest encryption. Local files will not be affected, however your version history will be lost.
sync.msg-migrate-confirmation: Migrating your vault may take some time. You will need to keep Obsidian active on this device to re-upload all your notes and attachments. It is best to do this on your primary device.
sync.msg-migrate-confirmation-size: You have {{size}} of data. Migrating your vault may take some time. You will need to keep Obsidian active on this device to re-upload all your notes and attachments. It is best to do this on your primary device.

file-recovery.name: File recovery
file-recovery.desc: Let you restore recent snapshots to recover from accidental data loss. Snapshots are only saved for Markdown files.
file-recovery.option-interval-description: Minimal interval in minutes between two snapshots.
file-recovery.option-keep-description: Length in days snapshots is kept for.
file-recovery.label-clear-warning: Are you sure you want to delete all snapshots? Note that only snapshots will be removed. All files inside your vault will not be affected.
file-recovery.label-select-file: Please select a file on the left to view snapshots.

note-composer.name: Note composer
note-composer.option-split-replacement-text-descriptio: What to show in place of the selected text after extracting it.
note-composer.option-template-file-description: Template file to use when merging or extracting. Available variables: {{content}}, {{fromTitle}}, {{newTitle}}, {{date:FORMAT}}, e.g. {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}}.
note-composer.command-merge-file: Merge current file with another file...
note-composer.label-confirm-file-merge: Are you sure you want to merge "{{file}}" into "{{destination}}"? "{{file}}" will be deleted.
note-composer.msg-fail-to-fetch-template: Failed to fetch template file: "{{template}}" not found.

web-viewer.name: Spletni pregledovalnik
web-viewer.desc: Odpri zunanje povezave do spletnih strani znotraj Obsidiana.
web-viewer.action-clear-data-cookies-desc: Lahko vas odjavi iz spletnih strani.
web-viewer.action-clear-data-all-desc: Odstrani vse zgoraj navedeno, kot tudi lokalno shranjevanje in aktivne seje.
web-viewer.label-fail-to-load-desc: Prepričajte se, da imate pravilen naslov.
web-viewer.option-open-external-links-desc: Odpri povezave v Obsidianu namesto v sistemskem privzetem brskalniku.
web-viewer.option-homepage-desc: Katero stran prikazati, ko je odprt spletni pregledovalnik
web-viewer.option-saved-markdown-desc: Spletne strani, shranjene kot markdown, bodo postavljene tukaj.
web-viewer.option-search-engine-desc: Iskalnik, uporabljen pri iskanju iz naslovne vrstice.
web-viewer.option-enable-adblock-desc: Če je omogočeno, bodo spodnji seznami filtrov uporabljeni za vse zavihke spletnega pregledovalnika.
web-viewer.option-adblock-lists-desc: En URL seznama za blokiranje oglasov na vrstico. Deljeno med vsemi sefi.
web-viewer.option-adblock-frequency-desc: Dnevi med posodabljanjem seznamov filtrov. 0 pomeni onemogočeno. Deljeno med vsemi sefi.

canvas.name: Platno
canvas.desc: Razporedite in povežite zapiske na neskončnem platnu.
canvas.action-drag-to-add-note: Povleci za dodajanje zapiska iz sefa
canvas.action-drag-to-add-media: Povleci za dodajanje medijev iz sefa
canvas.label-export-png-desc: Izvozi "{{title}}" kot PNG datoteko z nastavitvami spodaj.
canvas.option-new-canvas-location: Privzeta lokacija za nove datoteke platna
canvas.option-new-canvas-location-description: Kje so postavljene na novo ustvarjene datoteke platna.
canvas.option-new-canvas-folder-path: Mapa za ustvarjanje novih datotek platna
canvas.option-new-canvas-folder-path-descriptio: Na novo ustvarjene datoteke platna se bodo pojavile v tej mapi.
canvas.option-snap-to-grid-desc: Pripni kartice na mrežo ozadja pri premikanju in spreminjanju velikosti.
canvas.option-snap-to-objects-desc: Pripni kartice na bližnje predmete pri premikanju in spreminjanju velikosti.
canvas.option-zoom-breakpoint: Prag povečave za skrivanje vsebine kartice
canvas.option-zoom-breakpoint-desc: Nižje vrednosti bodo povečale zmogljivost, vendar bodo prej skrile vsebino kartice pri oddaljevanju.
canvas.option-export-png-show-logo-desc: To bo dodalo logotip Obsidian v spodnji levi kot.
canvas.option-export-png-privacy-mode-desc: To bo zameglilo besedilo na vašem platnu.
canvas.option-export-png-zoom-desc: Višja povečava bo ustvarila sliko z višjo ločljivostjo.
canvas.option-export-png-frame-desc: Izberite, ali želite upodobiti celotno platno ali samo trenutno vidno vidno polje.
canvas.label-longpress: Dotaknite se in držite za dodajanje / premikanje / izbiro

pdf.msg-password-protected: Ta PDF je zaščiten z geslom

properties.msg-empty-property-name: Ime lastnosti ne sme biti prazno.
properties.label-invalid-yaml-marker: Napaka v sintaksi. Vaša frontmatter je neveljavna.
properties.label-migration-warning-desc: Ali ste prepričani, da želite spremeniti vrsto? Nekateri podatki, povezani s tem ključem lastnosti, niso združljivi.
